publishedfiledetails.title: eco's Tek Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD ID: 816908578[/b][/h1]

[b]Craft scientific decor for your technological base![/b]

[h1][b]100% Stackable mod.[/b][/h1] 

[img=https://s13.postimg.cc/l1y536fpz/TK1.png][/img]

[h1]All items can be picked up. (Hold use key to pick up.)
If item is destroyed, after placing, it will return the exact amount of materials used to create it.
Engram cost: 0
Level needed to learn engram: 1
Items can be planted on the ground, in the water, on catwalks, foundations/ceilings, and rafts/platform saddles.
All items have HP[/h1]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/816908578/1842367319518201591/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/za8p6837d/Admin_TK.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/670764308/217691032441409625/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/clji6o195/Mod_Tek.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/816908578/1842367319518206971/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/pof4q0ri1/Bug_Reports.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/816908578/1318836262672780868/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/fd528jszz/FAQs.png[/img][/url]

[img=https://s17.postimg.cc/fa5k43q1b/TKbutton2.png][/img]

[h1][b]Mod includes:[/b][/h1]

[b]Crafting Desk with the following:[/b]

4 Chairs
Tall Stool
Tall Table
Tek Bed
6 Map Desks (Holographic and original)
Decorative Table
13 Holograms 
8 Experiments (Decor)
4 Floor Lights
4 Wall Lights
Painting Capsule (Quickly craft dye) 
Generator (Silent, Storm Safe)
8 Refrigerators (100 Inventory slots)
4 Counters (Medium Storage)
4 Wall Storage Boxes (Medium Storage)
4 Tall Storage Boxes (Large Storage)
Decorative 'Broken' Egg Incubator
Egg Incubator (.ini Settings and Information can be found [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/816908578/1519260397792576014/]here[/url])

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/816908578/1519260397792576014/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/w2sbw6h89/TEKEgg_Incubator.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://twitter.com/ArkSurvivalPlus][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/6wrdpgau1/TEKspecialthanks_Tao.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://www.patreon.com/ecoModsGames][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/5ibmqtqm1/patreon.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/8C3GUFt][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/c5men4b6x/Discord.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco][img]https://s22.postimg.cc/ehjqv7s7l/logicservers-banner.png[/img][/url]

Server Hosting Provided by [url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco]LogicServers[/url]
[b]Use promo code eco for 20% off[/b]
I receive NO payment from this company I just really like them :)


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/a5hosxe2h/TKInstall.png][/img]

[h1][b]Having issues installing or updating a mod?[/b][/h1]
[url=https://www.bluefangsolutions.com/adding-mods-to-your-ark-game-server/]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Text instructions
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6MmSoZdRA8]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Video instructions

[h1][b]MOD ID: 816908578[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Missing items?[/b][/h1]
If you updated the mod and are missing items then your install is probably corrupt. You must follow the instructions [b][u]specifically[/u][/b] for your server host.

[h1][b]Can't place items or find the Landscape Crafting Table engram?[/b][/h1]
If you can't place an item from this mod then your server probably hasn't updated with the latest version. If you can't find the engram make sure the mod is copied over to the server completely and the mod ID is listed under active mods. 

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/fi6j6jme1/TKMods.png][/img]
